The way I structure
the online exam

in textbooks,

And the last two questions--

in one of the questions,

see some students that

force an answer that's not

that any question given

their heads and say,

I don't think this question

interesting thing

because, in the real world,
you often get requirements

from customers that are
unrealistic or can't

of these questions

real-world situations

In the last question, I
then ask about systems

engineering-relevant things
that have happened that they
